artist: Artist: after Pablo Picasso; Author: Preface by Jaime Sabartès; Printer: Atelier Crommelynck, Paris; Colorist: Daniel Jacomet et Cie, Paris; Publisher: Au Vent d'Arles
description: Portfolio of 8 text leaves and 12 reproductions of watercolors and pastels, with one original aguatint with etching, housed in a folding blue cloth box with pochoir-illustrated upper cover
image_copyright: © Estate of Pablo Picasso %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
markings: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 7/500. Aquatint with etching (part of deluxe edition) numbered in pencil, LL: 7/75. Each plate numbered in pencil on the mount, LL
medium: Color lithographs heightened with pochoir, one aquatint with etching, letterpress; bound folio with loose plates
provenance: Mrs. Patrick Butler, St. Paul; given to MIA, 1967.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Picasso. Signed in the plates: Picasso
title: Les Bleus de Barcelone
